(Warning:i tested this in windows 10)

If you're like me and you have integrated graphics (if you have AMD apu's that's great) and the opengl method doesn't work use this:

Step 1 go to your ksp directory and right click on the KSP icon and then press create shortcut put the shortcut whereever you like (i prefer the desktop)

Step 2 right click on the shortcut you have created then click properties and in the target field double click then after the space after KSP.exe paste this: -force-directx11

step 3 run the game

step 4 profit?
